LocaleLayout.title: Edgemy - Poker Coaching Platform
LocaleLayout.description: Find your ideal poker coach among our experts. Personalized coaching in MTT, Cash Game and SNG.

home.title: Welcome to Edgemy
home.subtitle: The poker coaching platform that connects passionate players and coaches
home.description: Find the perfect coach to take your game to the next level

signUp.title: Become an Edgemy Coach
signUp.subtitle: Join our team of professional coaches

hero.title: Discover our elite poker coaches
hero.subtitle: Meet the top active coaches on Edgemy, available for tailored one-to-one sessions.

filters.title: Refine your search
filters.searchPlaceholder: Search a coach or a format...

states.error: We can't load coaches right now.

empty.title: No coach matches your search
empty.description: Adjust your filters or come back later, new coaches join Edgemy every week.

card.experience: {count, plural, one {# year of experience} other {# years of experience}}

loading.title: Loading your coaches
loading.subtitle: We are preparing your session history and coach insights.

section.title: My coaches
section.subtitle: Review your session history, reopen private channels and keep in touch with your coaches.

metrics.totalSessionsHint: All the sessions completed with your coaches
metrics.lastSessionHint: Date of your most recent session

empty.title: You haven't worked with a coach yet
empty.description: Explore our catalogue of experts to book your first session and accelerate your progress.
empty.highlight1: Benefit from personalised support tailored to your level and goals.
empty.highlight2: Review key hands with coaches specialised in MTT, Cash Game or Spin & Go.
empty.highlight3: Receive a clear training plan after each session.
empty.highlight4: Access exclusive resources shared by the coaches.

guide.title: Recommended action plan
guide.description: Follow these steps to find the right coach and schedule your first session.

step1.title: Explore coaches
step1.description: Filter by game format, stakes and specialities to identify the best profiles.

step2.title: Book a session
step2.description: Choose an available slot and confirm your booking in a few clicks.

step3.title: Prepare yourself
step3.description: Share your goals and hands to review to maximise the session's impact.

card.sessionsCount: {count, plural, one {# session completed} other {# sessions completed}}

channel.tooltip: Go to your Discord room to keep the conversation going and share resources.
